p: Vero C1008 cells (ECACC Cat. No.85020206) were obtained from Culture Collection, Public Health England, UK. Vero C1008 cells were maintained in Dulbecco's minimum essential media supplemented with 10% (v/v) fetal calf serum, 1% (v/v) L-glutamine and 1% (v/v) penicillin/streptomycin (Sigma). For experimental purposes, the fetal calf serum concentration was reduced to 2% (v/v).
